summary: Borneo, 1942: An American soldier escapes WWII and becomes the king of the headhunters in the jungle. Two British soldiers are parachuted into the area to find local support for the battle against the Japanese.
cast: Nick Nolte|Nigel Havers|Frank McRae|Gerry Lopez|Marilyn Tokuda|Chang Wing Choy|Aki Aleong|Marius Weyers|William Wise|Wayne Pygram|Richard Morgan|Elan Oberon|James Fox|Michael Nissman|John Bennett Perry
